Interface VirtualServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
LobbyController, MainServerController, RMIServerStubImpl
public interface VirtualServer extends Remote
Represents a remote object with which an RMI Client is able to interface to communicate with the underlying MainServerController.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    receiveMessage(ServerMessage message)
    Method called by the client remotely to send a message to the server.

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      void receiveMessage(ServerMessage message) throws RemoteException
      Method called by the client remotely to send a message to the server.
      Parameters:
      message - ServerMessage Message received by the server.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If the underlying RMI TCP channel is disrupted in any unrecoverable way.
